name: ActionBam mobile gamewars

name: Craig Lam
text: First, it needs to be mentioned that this is a totally new facility and is designed differently than the majority of stores you're been to. They also don't serve some very specific items like Signature Hot sauce and Pesto base pizza sauce. ‚Ä¶More

text: We came in 20 minutes b4 closing and no one rolled there eyes or sighed. We were greeted warmly at the door and seated. Our server was actually happy to see us. A gentleman that had waited on us before. We love this kind of atmosphere. The ‚Ä¶More

name: Nelson Bonilla
text: I ABSOLUTELY Love your Pizza.....Let me just say that first.... However.... I went a different route and tried your Chicken Alfredo Pasta... I was saddened by the portion size for $11.99$ and the presentation was subpar.. The food had ‚Ä¶More

name: Xiu Lin
text: I just bought some for my kids and they loved it! The pizza is fresh and delicious! The workers and managers there are also very friendly, would recommend! The store interior is also great and much better than most pizza restaurants, there‚Äôs a really nice atmosphere in there.

name: Scotty Sigmon
text: Excellent service. Pizza sauce was flavorful. Great balance of cheese, sauce and crust. Will definitely be coming back to watch the Gators crush the Bulldogs.

name: Matthew DeReimer
text: Great service and atmosphere. The food has always been really good and their draft selection is great. Doesn't get much better than pizza and beer on a nice outdoor patio like theirs.

name: Lady E
text: We have been watching the shopping center go up for months.  Seeing Johnny's Pizza coming in had us intrigued. We ordered delivery tonight and are floored. This has to be the best piiza we have ever had. Fresh ingredients  and veggies with ‚Ä¶More

name: Marc Ross
text: I've been before and it was ok. However last night was a bad night. They were short staffed and it showed. It took over 90 minutes for a large pie and a calzone.

name: Carolyn
text: Love the new Johnny‚Äôs Pizza at Hamilton mill rd. Buford! Great atmosphere and the pizza was great! Loved setting on the outdoor deck! My husband loved the different types of beer which by the way was ice cold! Give it a try you will not be disappointed!

name: Shiv Patel
text: Overall Pizza was decent, not great or bad... just ok. Flavorful, but salty dough.

name: mer s
text: My husband and I had eaten at this location recently, the dining experience was terrible. The food ordered took a long time and my sausage parm was way over cooked, and tasted terrible. The service is just so/so at best. The pizza was the only purchase I have liked.Disappointing experience.

name: RAFAEL RAMIREZ
text: Beer is great!! The patio is so amazing!! And the waitresses oh my God seeeeexxxyyyy!!! ü§§üòçüòçüòòüíØ

name: Desiree Presley
text: Ordered Johnny‚Äôs for the first time tonight, and we loved it. My husband says the meat pizza was delicious, and the garlic knots were amazing! On top of that, the service was fantastic when we picked up our order. We‚Äôll be back!!

name: Terrell Boynton
text: Ordered pizza online for curbside pickup. Called on arrival and was told pizza would be ready in 20 mins. When pizza was delivered to car I was expecting oven hot pizza and received warm and what tasted like it was re-heated.

name: Bran Gilbert
text: Absolutely great! My family and I are here on vacation at Lake Lanier islands . We decided to find a dine-in pizzeria.  After reading reviews of many local pizzerias we settled on Johnny's.   The extra drive across town from where we are staying was well worth the drive .

name: Suzette Watson
text: Great food,good service..try the cauliflower pizza. Delish

name: Jessica Jarrett
text: Amazing pizza, friendly service! We will definitely be returning.

name: Maddie Tufford
text: Y‚Äôall literally forgot the sauce on my PIZZA....

name: David Depierre
text: Great service, attentive bartenders, clean restaurant, show up for trivia on Monday nights!!!!

name: Davidson Cortlandt
text: Absolutely amazing and the pizza does remind me of being back home at one of the pizza spots.

name: Tyler Crawford
text: Great service, even when busy. Clean dining space and restroom. Big calzones, excellent pizza...great new addition to the area.

name: Lenix
text: Great pizza and calzones, glad we tried this pizzeria out and glad they‚Äôre down the street from our house. Would definitely recommend.

name: John Jimenez
text: Great pizza and other food was great to new place that opened real good food to thanks

name: Leanne Crawford
text: The garlic knots are soooo delicious! The calzone was huge and crazy tasty! The service was excellent and the owner personally came by to check on us and introduced himself. It was a wonderful experience for our family of five üëç. Our picky kids even found something they liked!

name: Stan Turner
text: Ordered Johnny's Meat deluxe calzone. Cooked just right and delicious. Service by Bryce was very good. We will definitely be back.

name: Ashley Gates
text: Nice an clean. Service was excellent. Pizza hot and delicious. Look forward to getting another pie from them!

name: Crystal Escalante
text: Excellent pizza and cheesy bread! Prompt delivery with DoorDash. We will be eating this pizza again!

name: Matt Lesser
text: First try at their pizza was a home run. Very delicious and very authentic to NYC pizza. Forced me to eat 4 slices of a large pie. Pies are pricy but worth it. Service was outstanding as well.

name: David Frye
text: As this was our first post stay in dining we were honored to be able to enjoy outstanding calzone and hoagie.  We were greeted at the door, seated and had excellent service by Megan.  Matt the owner  was overseeing the well oiled ‚Ä¶More

name: Andrew
text: This is the best pizza place in town. The garlic knots, large pizza, and cauliflower pizza all came out perfect and had me craving more. The quality of service is above and beyond.

name: Annellie Holmes
text: We were very excited Johnny's Pizza was coming to Buford. We used to live by the one on Sugarloaf Parkway and loved it. Our first time at Johnny's the pizza was burnt at the bottom but we gave them another try and it was better. We called ‚Ä¶More

name: George Konstantakis
text: Great pizza and wings, great service, nice people

name: Paul Murray
text: Really liked the food quality. Need more fans outside to keep the flies off the food on the patio.

name: Mrs Sam Oswald-Barnes
text: Picked up an order, thankfully as restaurant nearly full, no social distancing, several staff not wearing masks, no sanitizer being used, menus freely handed out to guests without cleaning in between, pandemic what pandemic. No wonder ‚Ä¶More

name: Mandrell Gwyn
text: Outstanding Food! Great customer service. Can't wait until the inside dining is open.

name: Chris Croker
text: The BEST pizza in the area! Awesome service!! We will be back again and again!

name: Winston Smith
text: Great Calzone!  Friendly atmosphere.

name: jeff fang
text: I had to wait for nearly 30 minutes to get my food, but it was not ready at last. I cancelled the order, during which time none of the waiters explained to me why

name: Anas Deeb
text: Very clean, friendly service and good food. I loved it

name: Ed Potts
text: This location opened 3 weeks ago great environment, awesome food and friendly staff!

text: Great service & great food!  Highly recommend!
